title: Rule
description: The Rule class is the parent of the Permission, Prohibition, and Duty classes. The Rule class represents the common characteristics of these three classes. A Rule class MUST be disjoint with all other Rule subclasses.

uid.description: A Rule MAY have none or one uid property values (of type IRI) to identify the Rule so it MAY be referenced by other Rules.

action.description: A Rule MUST have one action property value of type Action.

refinement.description: A Rule MAY have none, one or many constraint property values of type Constraint/LogicalConstraint.
